# apollo-server

## To run

### via Terminal

From project root...

- `npm i`
- `node server.js`

Can be reached at [http://localhost:4000/graphql](http://localhost:4000/graphql)

### via Docker

From project root...

- `docker build -t scrum-poker-server:latest .`
- `docker run -p 4000:4000 -d scrum-poker-server:latest`

Can be reached at [http://localhost:4000/graphql](http://localhost:4000/graphql)
